nodes.documentation: Function to add a new member to the committee
nodes.name: addMember

nodes.documentation: Function to pay the committee for the current cycle. It can be paid only once in the cycle
nodes.name: payCommittee

nodes.documentation: Function to transfer the committee to the account whose turn it is
nodes.name: withdrawCommitee

nodes.documentation: Function to stop the committee once it is finished
